title: please identify the font of this ''a''
author: ericquenneville

comments.content:
anybody know what this font is.

thanks

It's not a font, it's just one letter. Don't you have any more?

There are some geniuses on this forum but I think this is too little info even for them.

Nick Cooke

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023142416im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture_5871.jpg)

I'm sorry, here is the full logo.

I really like the ''a'' of it.

thank you
I'm with Nick. Got any more characters, or at least a reference to where you found this one.
That "c" looks like it's from Avant Garde. The "a" looks like it's a modified "s", and they look like they're Helvetica.
